changelog: Fixed manual latitude and longitude entry
Location text will scale to always fit in the info box
Latitude and longitude will be rounded to 3 decimal points when displayed in the info box (this will not affect the actual value used for getting weather, just the displayed value)
Added a notice to resulting location that the location in the info box may differ from the resulting location
Reverted a UI change that made the padding between day elements much smaller
Fixed alerts not appearing in some places
Moved refresh button to a floating button
Moved location and last refreshed text to a floating box between the 2 floating buttons
Location will include place name when manually setting latitude and longitude
Location should be more accurate when using location to latitude and longitude conversion
Removed the unnecessary location to latitude and longitude conversion button in Settings
